highlights.title: Waymo raises massive $16 billion round at $126 billion valuation, plans expansion to 20+ cities
highlights.description:
Waymo just closed a $16 billion funding round at a $126 billion valuation, the largest investment ever in an autonomous vehicle company. The Alphabet-backed robotaxi leader plans to use the capital to expand to over 20 new cities this year, including its first international markets.
more…

highlights.title: Elon is in the files, Tesla sales are down, and Ford is NOT working with Xiaomi
highlights.description:
On today’s island-hopping episode of Quick Charge, we have to talk about Elon Musk’s cringey appearance in the Epstein files amid Tesla’s rapid sales decline in Europe, as well as the ultra-fast Xiaomi SU7 Ultra and its own rapid sales decline.
more…

highlights.title: Tim Cook didn’t rule out price rises for Apple products, and here’s why
highlights.description:
Apple CEO Tim Cook declined to comment on repeated questions during Thursday’s earnings call about how the company would respond to rising memory costs.
The decision on whether to absorb rising costs or pass them on to customers in the form of higher prices is not going to be an easy one, and a look at the numbers makes it clear why Cook was unwilling to rule out the latter possibility …
more…

highlights.title: Every Pixelsnap case for Google’s Pixel 10 series is $10 off right now at Amazon
highlights.description:
Google finally brought built-in Qi2 support to the Pixel 10 series with Pixelsnap, but that doesn’t mean you can’t rely on magnet-equipped cases for your accessories. Right now, Google’s Pixelsnap cases for every Pixel 10 model in every single colorway are $10 off at Amazon.
more…

highlights.title: China finalizes proposed ban on Tesla-style hidden door handles for safety
highlights.description:
China has officially moved forward with a proposed ban on flush EV door handles, with an effective date of January 1, 2027. The regulation will force a redesign of many EVs with sleek, electronically-actuated handles, a design popularized by Tesla.
more…

highlights.title: Porsche Cayenne Electric enters production, we toured its battery factory
highlights.description:
As Tesla CEO Elon Musk pleaded for more battery infrastructure in America, we toured Porsche’s incredibly advanced Smart Battery facility in Slovakia.
more…

highlights.title: OpenAI launches Codex app for macOS, here are the details
highlights.description:
OpenAI has just launched a brand new Mac app: Codex, which it says is “the best way to build with agents.” Here are the details.
more…

highlights.title: Tesla still working on CarPlay support, here’s what we know
highlights.description:
Last November, Bloomberg broke the news that Tesla was working on CarPlay support, a dramatic shift in policy for Elon Musk’s company.
Here’s the latest on what we know about Tesla’s plans to support CarPlay.
more…

highlights.title: Steve Jobs memorabilia auction sees first ever Apple check sell for $2.4M [U]
highlights.description:
A Steve Jobs memorabilia auction included the first check the two Steves ever signed, and it sold for a mind-boggling $2,409,886.
The auction also included Steve’s desk and a set of bow ties he wore at school, as well as a wide range of general Apple memorabilia …
more…

highlights.title: Samsung’s Galaxy S26 Ultra will only include black or white S Pens, leaked image shows
highlights.description:
The Galaxy S26 trio initially seemed like it might shake up Samsung’s usual status quo, but some stiff competition from Apple and a failed attempt to relaunch the Edge series seems to have thrown those original plans out the window. Now, it seems like the Galaxy S26 Ultra might be boring in a different way, as it appears to be losing out on its usual color-matching stylus for something a little more boardroom-friendly.
more…

ev_autonomous.title: Ford denies report that it plans to build EVs in the US with China’s Xiaomi
ev_autonomous.description:
Ford is not planning to build electric vehicles in the US with China’s Xiaomi, despite a report claiming the partnership would “pave the way for Chinese carmakers to gain a foothold in the US.”
more…

ev_autonomous.title: Here’s everything new Apple TV has coming in February
ev_autonomous.description:
The early theme of Apple TV’s 2026 is new seasons of existing shows. January was packed with five such series, and now a couple more are coming in February—including a big-budget sci-fi epic. Here’s everything new coming to Apple TV in February.
more…

ev_autonomous.title: Chinese EV leaders MG and BYD bring the price war overseas
ev_autonomous.description:
MG launched the new MG4 EV Urban in the UK, priced at just £23,495 ($32,000), undercutting BYD’s popular Dolphin hatch as more affordable electric cars hit the market.
more…

ev_autonomous.title: Tesla (TSLA) can’t find the bottom in Europe as 2026 starts with another brutal decline
ev_autonomous.description:
The first batch of January 2026 registration data is in from Europe, and Tesla’s freefall on the continent shows no sign of slowing down. Across five major markets that have reported so far, Tesla registrations are down a staggering 44% year-over-year, extending what is now more than two years of continuous decline.
more…

ai.description:
OpenAI has just launched a brand new Mac app: Codex, which it says is “the best way to build with agents.” Here are the details.
more…

ai.title: 9to5Mac Daily: February 2, 2026 – iPhone Flip and CarPlay rumors
ai.description:
Listen to a recap of the top stories of the day from 9to5Mac. 9to5Mac Daily is available on iTunes and Apple’s Podcasts app, Stitcher, TuneIn, Google Play, or through our dedicated RSS feed for Overcast and other podcast players.
Sponsored by Stuff: Stuff helps you get everything out of your head and into a simple, elegant system—closing open loops and reducing mental stress. Use code 9TO5 at checkout for 50% off your first year.




 more…

ai.title: Apple clears a major manufacturing hurdle in India amid regulatory tension
ai.description:
The Indian government approved a measure on Sunday that allows Apple to directly finance iPhone manufacturing equipment in India without risking additional taxes. Here are the details.
more…

ai.title: Apple just released new updates for old versions of iOS, macOS, watchOS, more
ai.description:
Apple has just released a variety of new software updates for its devices, but they’re all for older versions of iOS, macOS, watchOS, and iPadOS. Here are the details.
more…

ai.title: Apple pulls select iOS updates due to connectivity issues [Updated]
ai.description:
Update 2, February 2, 2026 10:10am PT: Apple has released iOS 16.7.14. 
Update 1, January 28, 3pm PT: As noted by Aaron Perris, Apple has started signing iOS 12.5.8, iOS 15.8.6, and iOS 18.7.4 again. iOS 16.7.13, however, remains unavailable.
Original story (published January 28, 4:19am PT below): 
Apple this week released an array of iOS updates, including iOS 26.2.1, iOS 18.7.4, and more.
Now, however, it appears that Apple has pulled some of these new updates due to problems with network connectivity in Australia.
more…

ai.title: Apple TV unveils return of one of last year’s biggest hit series
ai.description:
Your Friends & Neighbors season 2 is coming soon, and Apple TV has just released the first trailer for the returning series—plus confirmed that season 3 is in the works.
more…

ai.title: Adobe Firefly offers unlimited image and video generations, third-party models included
ai.description:
Adobe is removing generation limits from Firefly, giving subscribers unlimited image and video generations across both its own models and supported third-party AI models, but you have to act quick. Here are the details.
more…

ai.title: What’s new in Android’s February 2026 Google System Updates
ai.description:
The monthly “Google System Release Notes” primarily detail what’s new in Play services, Play Store, and Play system update across Android phones/tablets, Wear OS, Google/Android TV, Auto, and PC. Some features apply to end users, while others are aimed at developers.
more…

ai.title: Google reduces Nest Cam ‘Video not available’ error with Home app 4.8
ai.description:
Version 4.8 of the Google Home app widely rolled out today with a “foundational fix” for the “Video not available” error with Nest Cams. 
more…

ai.title: Google Phone app rolls out ‘Keep portrait mode’ call setting on Android
ai.description:
After testing in December, Phone by Google has now rolled out a “Keep portrait mode on calls” setting to prevent automatic landscape rotation. 
more…

ai.title: Speechify adds celebrity voices to its AI Voice Assistant [U: ChatGPT integration]
ai.description:
Update, 2:09 p.m. ET: Speechify also launched a ChatGPT integration today. See new details below.
Speechify’s AI Voice Assistant can now sound like celebrities, including Snoop Dogg, Gwyneth Paltrow, and MrBeast. Here are the details.
more…

chips_cloud.title: Apple will need to walk a tightrope if it keeps pushing subscriptions
chips_cloud.description:
The list of Apple subscription services keeps growing. iCloud, Apple Music, Apple TV, Apple Arcade, Apple Fitness+, Apple News+, MLS Season Pass, Apple One … The company of course also takes a cut of subscriptions sold through the App Store, Apple Books, and Apple Podcasts. Then there are the hardware-related subscriptions, AppleCare+ and the iPhone Upgrade Program.
Most recently, we’ve had the launch of Apple Creator Studio, and a new report says that we can expect to see even more subscriptions to come … 
more…

chips_cloud.title: New Mac configurator may point to separate CPU and GPU options
chips_cloud.description:
Apple last week changed the way you buy a Mac online, removing the previous lineup of customizable pre-configured options and instead putting you straight into configuring your spec from scratch.
While at first glance this seems a somewhat strange thing to do, arguably making it a little more complicated for a non-tech buyer to choose their Mac, the change could provide support for a theory that Apple will allow you to separate CPU and GPU options when buying an M5 Pro or Max Mac … 
more…

space.title: Google Pixel teases ‘new theme packs are coming’ as Wicked theme ends
space.description:
Google Pixel’s new “theme packs” launched just a couple of months ago, but as the first release vanishes, Google says more “are coming.”
more…
